item.description:
"Woah, you like to think that you're immune to the stuff, oh yeah  It's closer to the truth to say you can't get enough, you know you're Gonna have to face it, you're addicted to love". -Robert Palmer

What is love?   Is love innate to us?  Is it learned?  Why do we love? Why are we lonely?  Why does it hurt? Is love blind?  Does our heart make us more foolish, make us less rational? How does our past shape us for better and worse?

What have you learned in your relationships?

 What do you feel still alludes you in relationships? Join us for a discussion the human condition commonly diagnosed as love.
item.how_to_find_us: Date subject to change. Look for us at the large table in back.
item.name: A General Theory of Love
